name: My Work At Paradise - B&W Game Jam
name_original: My Work At Paradise - B&W Game Jam
description:
Well... you are dead but guess what ? 
Life is not over !  But errhh.. It's not the only thing that is not over..
Now that you live in Paradise, you have to work like everybody and that so, you work is to purified the poor souls of the Fallen Angels with your Mighty Sword !
What ?
You are telling me that you are supposed to be a baker ?
Well... It's too late for you. Good luck !

Pitch : The project is a top down action game in which the storyline takes place in a paradise where you have to work and avoid debt. 

This prototype has been made for the Black & White Game Jam where the theme was Death Is A New Beginning and the restriction was to use a maximum of 2 colors on screen for a 1 bit graphics aestetics.

Controls :

KeyboardGamepadMove WSAD / ZQSDLeft JoystickAttack  / Left Mouse ButtonRight ShoulderDodge Space Bar / Left ShiftLeft TriggerClickSpace Bar / Enter / LMBSouth Button
